BattleCardAbility.Desc: Restore 1 Light upon discarding this page\n[On Use] Restore 1 Light
[On Use] Gain 1 Haste next Scene; Gain 1 Cycle next Scene; If Speed is higher than the target's, all dice on this page gain +2 minimum roll value
[On Use] Gain 3 Cycle next Scene; Draw 1 page
Draw 1 page upon discarding this page\n[On Use] If user has Cycle, all dice on this page gain +1 Power
[On Use] Restore 1 Light; If Speed is 2 or lower, boost the minimum value of all dice on this page by 1
[On Use] Gain 1 Overheat next Scene
[On Use] Gain 2 Overheat next Scene
[On Use] Spend 2 Overheat to restore 3 Light
[On Use] Gain 1 Strength this Scene, inflict 3 Bind to self next Scene
[Single-use] [On Use] Take damage equal to Overheat on self * 5
[On Use] Spend all Overheat, gain 1 Strength and Endurance this Scene for every 2 Overheat spent; Immobilize self next Scene
[After Use] If neither of the dice on this page hit, take 7 Stagger damage
[On Use] Take 4 Stagger damage and draw 1 page
[On Use] Take 4 Stagger damage and restore 1 Light
[Combat Start] Give a random ally 1 Damage Up this Scene
[On Use] Take 7 Stagger damage
[On Use] Gain 1 Ink; restore 1 Light
[On Use] If Ink is lower than 5, gain 1 Ink; if Ink is 5 or higher, spend 2 Ink to draw 2 pages
[On Use] Spend 2 Ink to give all dice on this page +2 power
[On Use] Gain 2 Ink, if Ink is 7 or higher, take 7 Stagger damage to give 3 random allies 1 Damage Up next Scene
[On Use] Spend 5 Ink to give all dice on this page +2 Power and “[On Hit] Inflict 2 Ink”
